entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
